TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ArgumentException extends System.SystemException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type ArgumentException = class inherit SystemException interface ISerializable

summary.span: 當其中一個提供給方法的引數無效時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when one of the arguments provided to a method is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當叫用方法，並至少一個傳遞的引數不符合呼叫之方法的參數規格時，會擲回。 is thrown when a method is invoked and at least one of the passed arguments does not meet the parameter specification of the called method. 屬性會識別無效的引數。The property identifies the invalid argument. 大多數情況下， common language runtime 或另一個類別庫所擲回，並指出開發人員的錯誤。Most commonly, an is thrown by the common language runtime or another class library and indicates developer error. 如果您擲回從您的程式碼中，您應該確保例外狀況的屬性包含有意義的錯誤訊息，描述無效的引數和預期的引數的值範圍。If you throw an from your code, you should ensure that the exception's property includes a meaningful error message that describes the invalid argument and the expected range of values for the argument. 主要的衍生類別都和。The primary derived classes of are and . 應該用於這些衍生的類別，而不是，除非在衍生類別都不是可接受的情況。These derived classes should be used instead of , except in situations where neither of the derived classes is acceptable. 比方說，應該會擲回例外狀況：For example, exceptions should be thrown by: - 每當`null`傳遞給不接受其為有效的引數的方法。 whenever `null` is passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument. - 當引數的值超出可接受的值; 的範圍例如，值為"46"形式傳遞時月引數建立期間。 when the value of an argument is outside the range of acceptable values; for example, when the value "46" is passed as the month argument during the creation of a . 如果方法呼叫並沒有任何引數，或失敗無關的引數本身，然後應該使用。If the method call does not have any argument or if the failure does not involve the arguments themselves, then should be used. 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT，其值 0x80070057。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擲回並攔截。The following example demonstrates how to throw and catch an . 它會使用[ArgumentException.GetType()。名稱](xref:System.Type.Name%2A)屬性來顯示例外狀況物件，以及使用名稱屬性以顯示例外狀況訊息的文字。It uses the [ArgumentException.GetType().Name](xref:System.Type.Name%2A) property to display the name of the exception object, and also uses the property to display the text of the exception message. [!code-cpp[ArgumentException#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArgumentException/cpp/argumentexception2.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ArgumentException#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArgumentException/CS/argumentexception2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ArgumentException#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArgumentException/vb/program2.vb#3)]

span.span: Handling and Throwing Exceptions

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息，說明錯誤，例如 「 已指定無效的引數 」。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "An invalid argument was specified." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息，說明錯誤，例如 「 已指定無效的引數 」。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "An invalid argument was specified." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|

summary.span: 使用序列化資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

related.span: XML 和 SOAP 序列化

span.span: XML and SOAP Serialization

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 參數不是 null 參考，目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性使用的值的新執行個體`message`參數。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the value of the `message` parameter. `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

span.span: Handling and Throwing Exceptions

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用所有指定要序列化的例外狀況物件資料來設定 。 sets a with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 還原序列化期間，系統例外狀況物件資料流上傳輸。During deserialization, the exception object is reconstituted from the transmitted over the stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 取得錯誤訊息和參數名稱，在參數名稱未設定時只會取得錯誤訊息。

span.span: Gets the error message and the parameter name, or only the error message if no parameter name is set.

value.span: 描述例外狀況之詳細資料的文字字串。

span.span: A text string describing the details of the exception.

value.span: 這個屬性值是下列兩種形式中的一種：

span.span: The value of this property takes one of two forms:
Condition
Value

term.span: 是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 ) 或長度為零。

span.span: The is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) or of zero length.

description.span: 傳遞給建構函式的 字串。

span.span: The string passed to the constructor.

term.span: 不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 ) 且長度大於零。

span.span: The is not null reference ( in Visual Basic) and it has a length greater than zero.

description.span: 與無效參數名稱附加在一起的 字串。

span.span: The string appended with the name of the invalid parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會覆寫。This property overrides . 應該當地語系化錯誤訊息。The error message should be localized.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ParamName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ParamName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得造成這個例外狀況的參數名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the parameter that causes this exception.
The parameter name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個應該執行造成此例外狀況的參數名稱。Every should carry the name of the parameter that causes this exception. 此屬性是唯讀的而且與傳遞到建構函式會傳回相同的值。This property is read-only, and returns the same value as was passed into the constructor. 覆寫方法應該是僅用於自訂的參數名稱的格式。Overriding methods should be used solely to customize the format of the parameter name. 參數名稱不應進行當地語系化翻譯。The parameter name should not be translated for localization purposes.
